trans-unit.source: Represents core pieces of custom personalization state information contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 代表核心自訂的個人化狀態資訊中所包含的片段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class represents pieces of custom state information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> object made available by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表片段中所包含的自訂狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>物件可由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This information is used by other classes and interfaces in the personalization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊是由其他類別和介面個人化基礎結構中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref> class using the specified value and scope.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref>類別使用指定的值和範圍。

trans-unit.source: Note that the custom state information contained in the `value` parameter must have an associated scope as specified in the `scope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，自訂狀態資訊包含在`value`參數必須要有相關聯的範圍中所指定`scope`參數。

trans-unit.source: Entries in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary> must explicitly indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>必須明確指出是否的自訂資料視為可個人化中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>範圍。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In this constructor, the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> property defaults to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此建構函式的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性預設為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the `scope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 個人化資料中的個人化範圍相關聯的物件`scope`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> that applies to the custom personalization information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>可套用至自訂的個人化資訊。

trans-unit.source: scope is set to a value that is not a valid member of .
trans-unit.target: scope設定值不是有效的成員，這個值為 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref> class using the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref>類別使用提供的參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> that contains data that should not be serialized in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>包含不應該匯出之 Web 組件格式序列化的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of `isSensitive` to `true`, the Web Parts export handler will not serialize the data for export.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定的值`isSensitive`至`true`，Web 組件匯出處理常式不會序列化匯出的資料。

trans-unit.source: An object of personalization data associated with the personalization scope in the `scope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 個人化資料中的個人化範圍相關聯的物件`scope`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> that applies to the custom personalization information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>可套用至自訂的個人化資訊。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating if the custom state information is sensitive and should not be exported.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否自訂狀態資訊是機密，不應該匯出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Boolean value that indicates if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref> contains sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry"></xref>包含機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts personalization information can contain sensitive data that should not be exported to other controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件個人化資訊可以包含不應該匯出到其他控制項的機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the Web Parts import and export process.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性由 Web 組件匯入和匯出處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A> to `true` causes the Web Parts export handler to not serialize the data in the exported Web Part format.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>至`true`會導致要序列化的資料匯出之 Web 組件格式的 Web 組件匯出處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sensitive setting for the attribute is set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性的機密設定就會設定。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此個人化資料的項目相關聯的個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: This property's effect is similar to specifying the scope associated with a public property using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的效果是類似於指定範圍相關聯的公用屬性，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set the personalization scope of the personalization information that makes up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來設定組成的個人化資訊的個人化範圍<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry>

trans-unit.source: All entries must have a scope associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目必須具有與其相關聯的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.
trans-unit.target: 此個人化資料的項目相關聯的個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: scope is set to a value that is not a valid member of .
trans-unit.target: scope設定值不是有效的成員，這個值為 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the personalization state information for this entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目的個人化狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Note that the custom state information contained in this property must have an associated scope, specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個屬性所包含的自訂狀態資訊必須具有相關聯的範圍中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationEntry.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: An object representing personalization state information.
trans-unit.target: 代表個人化狀態資訊的物件。
